author: Gab Hernandez
description:
Warhammer 40,000 would simply not be possible without the infamous Horus Heresy. The popularity of that storyline was so immense that Games Workshop saw it fit to spin the era off into its own game.  Much like any good Imperium propaganda, the 30k gameplay is more about rule of cool, harkening back to previous editions of 40k.

Continue reading Standalone Saturnine kits are coming to Warhammer: The Horus Heresy
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Horus Heresy book order, Warhammer 40k factions, Warhammer 40k primarchs
title: Standalone Saturnine kits are coming to Warhammer: The Horus Heresy

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
If there’s one era that’s forever associated with board games, then it’s got to be the 1980s. Thanks to rose-tinted 3D anaglyph glasses,  countless people have nostalgia for that era’s gaming, particularly on the tabletop. Certainly, Stranger Things played a massive role in refiring that nostalgia. But nothing beats the original movie, which perfectly encapsulates 80s adventure: The Goonies.

Continue reading The Goonies: Never Say Die board game is 46% off, and it's an 80s throwback!
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: The Goonies: Never Say Die board game is 46% off, and it's an 80s throwback!
